00124   int get_susceptible_date() const {
00125     if (recovery_period > -1) {
00126       return get_recovery_date() + recovery_period;
00127     } else {
00128       return INT_MAX;
00129     }
00130   }
00131 
00135   int set_susceptibility_period(int period) {
00136     return susceptibility_period = period;
00137   }
00138 
00142   int get_unsusceptible_date() const {
00143     return exposure_date + susceptibility_period;
00144   }
00145

00164   // parameters
00168   bool is_infectious() { return infectivity > trajectory_infectivity_threshold; }
00169 
00173   bool is_symptomatic() { return symptoms > trajectory_symptomaticity_threshold; }

00190 
00194   void modify_susceptibility(double multp) { susceptibility *= multp; }
00195 
00199   void modify_infectivity(double multp) { infectivity_multp *= multp; }
00200 
00205   double get_infectivity(int day) const {
00206     day = day - exposure_date;
00207     Trajectory::point point = trajectory->get_data_point(day);
00208     return point.infectivity * infectivity_multp;
00209   }
